tweets.author: 西スポWEB OTTO! タカ番がつぶやくソフトバンクホークス最新情報・裏情報
tweets.text:
SoftBank  
Pitcher John Duplantier's acquisition nearly finalized  

6 wins this season with Hanshin, contributed to league V but became free agent  
Rejected offers from Hanshin, who wished for his retention, and other NPB teams  

▼Article here▼#sbhawks

thread_replies.author: LIYAU NQ
thread_replies.text: 正直後半戦と日本シリーズ活躍してないし、過大評価しすぎな気もする

thread_replies.author: LIYAU NQ
thread_replies.text: 要するに強奪されたって事ねもう巨人よりえぐいなw

thread_replies.author: LIYAU NQ
thread_replies.text:
I wanted Kay, though  
I only have the image of the Japan Series  
It's kinda meh, huh

thread_replies.author: GT
thread_replies.text: It’s probably some outrageous contract, huh. Concentrating talent in one financially powerful team will ultimately drag down the league in the long run. If they can’t implement something like a total salary cap, I’d rather see more parent companies with deep pockets pop up.

thread_replies.author: 二ャワン
thread_replies.text:
Lucky you. With the ultimate souvenir of that epic meltdown betrayal pitch in Game 2 that decided the fate of the Japan Series, head to Hakata right now, not just gradually.

Have you been secretly negotiating since then? It wasn't match-fixing, right?

thread_replies.author: ハンカチ
thread_replies.text: Moinelo got the Japanese roster spot, that's huge.

thread_replies.author: ますだん
thread_replies.text:
Paying a billion to the guy who goes out with a painful injury after pitching like at his peak with a 6-3 record, huh?  
As expected from SoftBank, huh.

thread_replies.author: jojojo
thread_replies.text: In short, it means it got robbed, huh?  Way more brutal than the Giants, lol.

thread_replies.author: ry
thread_replies.text:
I wanted Kei, though  
I only have the image of the Japan Series  
It's kinda meh  
More than that, I want them to get a foreign batter—  
A long ball hitter  
There's a real chance Yamakawa will suck again next year  
It's more fun to watch with a foreigner around, y'know

thread_replies.author: ブラックインパルス
thread_replies.text: They ain't staying with Hanshin anymore, but they're joining the championship trip!? They should at least cover the accommodation costs themselves, right? lol

tweets.author: まこっちゃん
tweets.text:
Dupree getting to the Hawks.........
From my perspective, it's a topic that's neither painful nor itchy, nothing at all
If your blood pressure shoots up from such a topic and you end up with a stroke, that'd be putting the cart before the horse, wouldn't it~
Baseball isn't

tweets.author: Wasbak
tweets.text: I get the transfer, but no mercy for players who turned down the Hanshin. Honestly, it'd be a problem if they go on to dominate over there.

tweets.author: Wasbak
tweets.text: 行くのは自由やけど、阪神ファンとしては“頑張れ”なんて言えるわけないよな…。

tweets.author: Wasbak
tweets.text: ほんまそれ。金出すとこ行くのは仕方ないけど、阪神断ったなら情けは要らんよな。向こうで無双なんて絶対させんでいい。
